title: Why Church Architecture Is Critical to Your Ministry Strategy with Mel McGowan - Episode 67 -
itunes:title: Why Church Architecture Is Critical to Your Ministry Strategy with Mel McGowan - Episode 67 -
description:
Your church building might be saying more than you think. Your architecture is either helping or hindering your ministry. From the design to the people in charge of it all, there are ways to leverage your church building that actually help your church's mission.

Mel McGowan is Co-Founder of PlainJoe Studios as well as a church architect. In this conversation with Tony Morgan, Mel shares compelling thoughts on the theology of church architecture and practical insights into the building process.

For more resources and to join the conversation you can go to the show notes at theunstuckgroup.com/episode67.
